title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 203.24 - Change in approved crematory operator course of study
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 203.24 - Change in approved crematory operator course of study

State Regulations

There shall be no change or alteration in any approved course
of study of any subject or in any instruction staff or provider without prior
written notice and approval by the Division of Cemeteries. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
203.24

Renumbered from 204.10

New

York State Register August 7, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 32, eff. 8/7/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
